name: Human
description: Versatile and adaptable, humans are the most common race in many worlds. They excel in all professions and can adapt to any situation.

name: Elf
description: Graceful and long-lived, elves possess keen senses and a natural affinity for magic. They are masters of the bow and skilled in arcane arts.
traits: Trance: 4 hours of meditation instead of 8 hours sleep

name: Dwarf
description: Hardy and resilient, dwarves are master craftsmen and fierce warriors. They have an innate resistance to poison and magic.
traits: Stonecunning: Proficiency in History checks related to stonework

name: Halfling
description: Small and nimble, halflings are known for their luck and courage. Despite their size, they make formidable adventurers.
traits: Halfling Nimbleness: Move through spaces of larger creatures

name: Orc
description: Strong and fierce, orcs are natural warriors with an indomitable spirit. They thrive in battle and never back down from a challenge.
traits: Relentless Endurance: Drop to 1 HP instead of 0 once per long rest
Savage Attacks: Extra damage die on critical hits

name: Dragonborn
description: Proud dragon-descended warriors, dragonborn combine draconic heritage with humanoid form. They can breathe destructive energy.
traits: Draconic Ancestry: Choose dragon type for breath weapon
Breath Weapon: Area damage based on ancestry
Damage Resistance: Resistance to breath weapon damage type
